attributes.action: Provide all primary aged children with free school meals
attributes.additional_details: All children in primary school deserve to have a hot meal everyday. I don’t understand why children in years reception to year 2 are more worthy of a hot meal than the ks2 children. This is not equality and it is unfair.
attributes.background: Free school meals are currently available for Reception, Year 1 and year 2. I would like the government to extend this to include years 3,4,5 and 6.

rejection.details:
The following petition calls for a similar action: 

Provide free school meals to all school children 
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/703256
